archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Coordinate and document crisis meeting
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
During first meeting Record Keeper supported by reporter will provide the first status report and following topics shall be included into the meeting agenda:
Presentation of overall status of the situation – supported by Situation Awareness Picture - SAP (Facts – what do we know only, Prognosis – only this topic, Directions, Actions/Decisions) each box at the time, no jumping between topics, focus on the structure.
Further development of Situation Awareness Picture.
Each contributor must start speech by saying Name and Role of her/his own.
Close Situation Awareness Picture by agreed Actions/Decisions with clear justification of those.
Agree the next recurring meetings.
Record Keeper is responsible of organizing the next meetings.
Meeting must not end unless Actions/Decisions with responsibilities (decision justification who when) are agreed by all members.
Record Keeper presenting Situation Awareness Picture thru whole meeting.
In each meeting must be updated Facts, re-evaluated Prognosis and Directions. Retrospective analysis based on Actions/Decisions taken on previous meeting.
All roles involved into Actions/Decisions take responsibility for their piece of cake.
